column5: The warm months have been somewhat bittersweet for my family and I , the fishing being the Sweet Part.  On the weekend of June 4th, 5th and 6th I loaded the boat and the boys and we headed off to fish and enjoy the Mudcat Festivle in Dunnville.    Here is a summary of the entire weekend... The kids had a blast, the fireworks were amazing and if you ever need a place to camp... Fishmasters rents out an awesome trailer right on the river at a great price!          Perch, silver bass, walleye, sheephead and the occational out of season smallie...  What a great weekend with Steve and the boys. !  Can't wait to get out again..
Some excellent looking fish there, Jen. Glad it was a good weekend for everyone.  edited to add: And I'll just bet that Sonny is thrilled that you were using the boat.
Looks like a great time. I know he was there with you too.
looks like you had alot of fun. great looking fish!
Great report and pics Jen!  Nice to see you guys getting out there...some HUGE perch there!
